actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 20, United States Code, to authorize former members of the Armed Forces who are totally disabled as the result of a service-connected disability to travel on military aircraft in the same manner and to the same extent as retired members of the Armed Forces are entitled to travel on such aircraft.

summary.text: Provides for free travel on military aircraft for any former member of the armed forces who has a service-connected disability rated total by the Veterans Administration (effective March 1989, Department of Veterans Affairs).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 20, United States Code, to authorize former members of the Armed Forces who are totally disabled as the result of a service-connected disability to travel on military aircraft in the same manner and to the same extent as retired members of the Armed Forces are entitled to travel on such aircraft.
